title: What K-pop song do you dislike just because of one word in the lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: I only dislike one K-pop song, which is 'War Of Hormones' by- BTS The song is about teenager boys who are in love with a girl and they say very uncomfortable things. I have only chosen some parts which makes me feel really uncomfortable. “Women wear things that make me cough cough, see right through, see right through (Very much) thank you! For improving my eye sight My eyes keep turning to the girls (yup) Women are like an equation, us guys are the solution (yup) Wear them more, your high heels I’m 18, I know what I need to know That women are the best in the world Yes I’m a bad boy so i like bad girl Come here baby, we’re gonna hit it off My testosterone heavily shows up After winning a war of hormones I’ll do some research, your existence is against the rules, a foul If the standard of beauty is in the ocean, you’re the deep ocean A mini cultural asset that should be taken care of on a national level Her hair, body, waist, legs, even her other unspeakable parts If anyone says he’s not interested in them, I’d be surprised as a man The tiniest gestures make me lose it Girl, your temptations make me sit at my computer every night. (Looking at her profile)” As a fangirl, I hate this lyrics and for that I even thought of leaving BTS fandom. All fangirl find this uncomfortable.

i don’t hate any kpop song because of a word they said, i dont even care about the lyrics, the only lyrics i love and always watch is bts and blackpink, but any other kpop group no, i dont even know their lyrics lol
